Today we sign the bill of tax reform aimed at increasing the quality and access to Preschool, School and Higher Education
With this reform we will increase scholarships for Higher Education from 118 thousand in 2009, to more than 400 thousand in 2014.
It will also allow the increase of 75,000 places in pre-kindergarten and kindergarten, giving free coverage for all children of the most vulnerable 60%.
Also, the modification of the SIPCO, in the face of increases in oil, will give deserved relief to families in the price of fuel.
